Title: Nana Gallagher Had an Affair
Writer: John Wells (developer), Paul Abbott (creator), Paul Abbott, Cindy Caponera (teleplay), Cindy Caponera (television story)
Actors: William H. Macy, Emmy Rossum, Justin Chatwin, Ethan Cutkosky
Plot: Monica's return to the family wreaks havoc on the Gallagher clan -- leaving the children determined to find out if Frank is their real father. Fiona moves in with Steve next door.
